challenges.name: Introduction
challenges.mission: Which organization is responsible for the CVSS specification?

options.display: FIRST - Forum of Incident Response and Security Teams (https://www.first.org/)
OWASP - Open Worldwide Application Security Project (https://owasp.org/)

challenges.name: Case Studies
challenges.mission: Which CVSS metric covers the following exploitation prerequisite: "Attacker needs to trick a victim into ..."

challenges.name: Score Vulnerability 1
challenges.mission: Enter the CVSS v4 Vector string (i.e. CVSS:4.0/AV:x/AC:x/AT:x/PR:x/UI:x/VC:x/VI:x/VA:x/SC:x/SI:x/SA:x) which can be copied by clicking on the green CVSS Vector box in the CVSS calculator

challenges.name: Score Vulnerability 2
challenges.mission: Enter the CVSS v4 Vector string (i.e. CVSS:4.0/AV:x/AC:x/AT:x/PR:x/UI:x/VC:x/VI:x/VA:x/SC:x/SI:x/SA:x) which can be copied by clicking on the green CVSS Vector box in the CVSS calculator
